name: Debug Spinning Cube Creation
prompt: Create a spinning cube. It should be a red cube that spins continuously on its Y axis.

verify.code: () => { const game = window.__VOXEL_GAME__; const cubes = game.animals.filter(a => a.constructor.name.toLowerCase().includes('cube') || a.constructor.name.toLowerCase().includes('spin')); console.log('[DEBUG] Found entities:', cubes.map(c => ({ name: c.constructor.name, rotation: c.rotation, meshRotY: c.mesh?.rotation?.y }))); if (cubes.length === 0) return { success: false, message: 'No spinning cube found' }; const cube = cubes[0]; const initialRotation = cube.rotation || 0; return new Promise(resolve => { setTimeout(() => { const finalRotation = cube.rotation || 0; const delta = Math.abs(finalRotation - initialRotation); console.log('[DEBUG] Rotation check:', { initial: initialRotation, final: finalRotation, delta }); if (delta > 0.1) { resolve({ success: true, message: `Cube is spinning! Rotation delta: ${delta.toFixed(2)}` }); } else { resolve({ success: false, message: `Cube NOT spinning. Rotation unchanged: ${initialRotation} -> ${finalRotation}` }); } }, 2000); }); }
